properties.name: propertyName
properties.label: Name of the property to autosave on Change (example: '.pyDescription')

name: Pega_Extensions_Banner
label: Banner
description: Display a banner with messages about the case

properties.name: dataPage
properties.label: Data Page name to get the messages

properties.name: dismissAction
properties.label: Case Wide Action ID to dismiss the banner

defaultConfig.inputProperty: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

properties.name: useInDashboard
properties.label: Set to true if you are using in a dashboard - use a queryable data page

properties.name: dataPage
properties.label: List Data Page name to get all objects

properties.name: createClassname
properties.label: Create case className (empty to disable create)

properties.name: detailsDataPage
properties.label: Data Page used to show the card (pyID as param)

properties.name: detailsViewName
properties.label: Name of the view used to retrieve case details

name: Pega_Extensions_CaseLauncher
label: Case Launcher
description: Widget will render a heading, text and a button to start a case

properties.name: heading
properties.label: Header
properties.defaultValue: Please insert here a personalized header

properties.name: description
properties.label: Description
properties.defaultValue: Please insert here a personalized short description.

properties.name: dataPage
properties.label: Savable DP that will be called for Refresh

name: Pega_Extensions_DisplayAttachments
label: Display Attachments
description: Display the attachments for a specific category

properties.name: width
properties.label: width of the pdf in px or %

properties.name: height
properties.label: Height of the pdf in px

properties.name: refreshActionLabel
properties.label: Label of the Refresh Action button

properties.name: categoryFieldName
properties.label: Category field name
properties.helperText: Possible categories: 'PROJECT', 'TASK', 'MILESTONE'. 'PROJECT' can be parent of 'TASK' and/or 'MILESTONE'

properties.name: detailsDataPage
properties.label: Data Page used to retrieve case details (pyID as param)
properties.helperText: Data page used to fetch DetailsView for each item

properties.name: detailsViewName
properties.label: Name of the view used to retrieve case details

name: Pega_Extensions_JapaneseInput
label: Japanese Input
description: Japanese input component that supports Hiragana to Katakana, Full-Width to Half-Width, Lowercase to Uppercase, and Japanese Era to Gregorian conversions.

properties.name: dataPage
properties.label: List Data Page name to get all cases

properties.name: contextProperty
properties.label: Context for filtering the data page

properties.name: createClassname
properties.label: Create case className (empty to disable create)

properties.name: detailsDataPage
properties.label: Data Page used to retrieve case details (pyID as param)

properties.name: detailsViewName
properties.label: Name of the view used to retrieve case details

properties.name: bFreeFormDrawing
properties.label: Set to true if you want to draw on the map using the sketch tool

properties.name: createTools
properties.label: list of tools for the Sketch component

properties.name: bShowSearch
properties.label: Set to true to display a search bar

properties.name: dataPage
properties.label: Data Page name used to source the data

properties.name: showMetaData
properties.label: Show the meta data on the screen

name: Pega_Extensions_OAuthConnect
label: OAuth Connect
description: Allows to integrate external applications into Constellation UI using OAuth 2.0 authorization code grant flow

properties.name: currencyCode
properties.label: CurrencyCode. Set to empty string for no currency

name: Pega_Extensions_Shortcuts
label: Shortcuts
description: Render a list of shortcuts in a widget

properties.name: pages
properties.label: Name of each page with the class (e.g. Data-Portal.SearchPage), comma-separated list

properties.name: pageJSON
properties.label: JSON of the categories and pages

properties.name: trendData
properties.label: Trend data if showing a percentage or trend of values

name: Pega_Extensions_UtilityList
label: Utility List
description: List of objects for the utility column
